sections.heading: Transfer of Powers and Duties of the Transportation Needs Study Committee to the State Transportation Commission by Type III Transfer; Transfer of Powers and Duties of the Citizens Advisory Committee to the Director of the Department of Transportation by Type III Transfer
sections.text: Transfer of Powers and Duties of the Transportation Needs Study Committee to the State Transportation Commission by Type III Transfer; Transfer of Powers and Duties of the Citizens Advisory Committee to the Director of the Department of Transportation by Type III Transfer.
